did.unittitle: Administrative Personnel Association of the Presbyterian Church records

bioghist.p: Joyce P. Bauer organized the Presbyterian Secretarial Association, PCUS, in 1976. The association changed names in 1984 to the Administrative Personnel Association. Prior to reunion in 1983, the association welcomed the participation of administrative personnel of the UPCUSA.

scopecontent.p: Scrapbooks document the annual meetings of the Administrative Personnel Association as well as yearly business activities. Scrapbooks include minutes, photographs, regional reports, correspondence, bylaws, budgets and financial reports, pamphlets, and other memorabilia, as well as issues of the association newsletter, called variously: The Girl Friday, The Latest News, and APA News. Scrapbooks cover the following years: 1976-1982, 1978-1986, 1984, 1987-1990, 1990-1991, 1992-1994, 1999, 2000, and 2001. The 2001 scrapbook also includes a small amount of material for 2002 and 2003. Additionally, there are national conference scrapbooks for 2002 and 2003.
